typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		Name as string,
		City as string,
		address as string,
		dno as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputemp
source(output(
		dno as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptscr
Filter1 derive(Name = upper(Name)) ~> ModifyColumns1
ModifyColumns1, deptscr join(inputemp@Id == deptscr@dno,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
inputemp filter(equals(dno,'3')) ~> Filter1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Empdetp.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Id,
		Name = ModifyColumns1@Name,
		dno = deptscr@dno,
		name = deptscr@name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
